articles.title: Rupee hits record low as Asian peers tumble on Fed rate view - Economic Times
articles.description: The rupee closed at a record low of 80.86 to the dollar, down from 79.9750 in the previous session.
articles.content:
The Indian rupee dropped to a record low versus the U.S. dollar on Thursday, as Asian currencies declined on concerns over the pace and quantum of U.S. Federal Reserve's policy tightening ahead.
